full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,THUB PA CHEN PO BCOM LDAN 'DAS KYI BSRUNG BZLOG GSANG GSUM GYI ZHAL CHOG SHIN TU BSDUS PA ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @003A *, ,(CES THUB PA CHEN PO BCOM LDAN 'DAS KYI BSRUNG BZLOG GSANG GSUM GYI ZHAL CHOG 'DI ZLA BA YAR NGO'I TSE DRUG BCU DRUG NYER DRUG MAR NGO'I TSE DGU BCU DGU NYER DGU NYIN PAR KHA TON DU BGYIS, GANGS NI GAM NYER GCIG BCU BZHI 'AM BDUN BRJOD NA LUS NGAG YID GSUM GYI BSRUNG BA DANG 'GAL RKYEN PHYI NANG GI BAR CHAD SDANG DGRA PHYOGS NGAN PA THAMS CAD PHYIR LA BZLOG PA DANG, TSE DANG BSOD NAMS DBANG THANG 'PHEL BAR 'GYUR RO, ,BAN STONG BON STON GI MTHU BSGRUB KYANG BDE MOR ZHAL CHOG GO , ,,'GRO BA THAMS CAD LA DGE BAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
